statements: UPDATE PopulationTracking SET population_size = 10000, year = 2021 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE population_dynamics SET population_size = 1500, sampling_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE population_id = 1;

UPDATE population_dynamics SET population_size = 1500, location = 'City A' WHERE population_id = 101
